summary:
Additional Information
Fighting Style: Close Combat, Long distance combat
Occupation: Pro Hero.
Affiliation: Ketsubutsu Gakuen...
body:
[BNHA OC] Snowen

Additional Information

Fighting Style: Close Combat, Long distance combat

Occupation: Pro Hero.

Affiliation: Ketsubutsu Gakuen Academy

||Quirk and Skills||

Her quirk allows her to create frost from any part of her body, she is able to shape and size it, which gives her the ability to create weapons, utensils or whatever she needs. The duration time of the created object depends on its size, the larger it is, the shorter the durability time it will have.

His particularity is useful but not powerful, so it depends on the capacity and speed of his body to move and thus fight the villains. For that reason he always trains to stay agile and fit.

[Disadvantages]

The prolonged use of your quirk can cause a decrease in your body temperature and hardening of your joints. While your skin is ready to receive the impact of your quirk, your internal organs do not have enough resistance to withstand temperatures below -20º

||Relations||

》Rumi Usagiyama [Rabbit Hero: Mirko] (Friends)

》Wing Hero: Hawks (Friends)

》Emi Fukukado [Smile Hero: Ms. Joke] (Friends)

summary:
Happy Valentine's Day everybody! I created a mega 
collab dubbed "The Most Ambitious Crossover" with some of my mutual art...
caption:
Happy Valentine’s Day everybody! I created a mega collab dubbed “The Most Ambitious Crossover” with some of my mutual art homies! Half of us are from different countries and all from different U.S. states! We truly were the most ambitious crossover ;) thank you guys so much for doing this with me!! I had so much fun and I learned a lot more for next time!

I drew Midnight!
Go to everyone else’s page to see their full character!

@lavenderlady1999 - mina
@coralflow - toga
@jazzmonster - monoma
@pesql - jirou

Instagram artists:
helens_art111 - dabi
tacothehuman - iida
sayorimax - shigaraki
atrix.atr - hawks
bianxiee.arts - nana
marcela.chan - small might


Obviously I had to make a cursed image at 3am when I edited everything last night.

summary:
BTW, HAPPY VALENTINES DAY❤❤❤
Quick little announcement about my fics hehe
For those of you who have been waiting for an update...
body:
BTW, HAPPY VALENTINES DAY❤❤❤

Quick little announcement about my fics hehe

For those of you who have been waiting for an update for Duet, im sO sorry for taking so long SKSKS

right now im currently trying to figure out how to move the story along bc it feels like its at a plateau, ive been writing chapter 12 and ive already uploaded 9 chapters, plus i dont want writers block to hit me too hard already

Anyways, thats that about Duet! And if you haven’t read it or if you’re new here, Duet is my first bakudeku slowburn fic im currently working on. PLEASE go and read it!

LINK IN MY BIO!!

ALSO a lot of you voted for the Poison concept for my next bakudeku fic, im so excited to start on that! I have SOOO many high school au ideas, and i wanna finish Duet before I start on that so hang tight :,))

ANYWAYS, thanks for sticking around haha :,)) MUCH LOVE AND HAPPY VALENTINES DAY I LOVE YOU ALL❤❤

summary:
Bakudeku on Valentine's day:
Deku: *cheerfully* Good morning Ka- *small book hits his head*
Kacchan: *lowkey feeling bad* "Get...
body:
Bakudeku on Valentine’s day:

Deku: *cheerfully* Good morning Ka- *small book hits his head*

Kacchan: *lowkey feeling bad* “Get up, nerd. Are you hurt?”

Deku: *tears start to appear on his eyes as he blushes*

Kacchan: *actually showing that he feels bad* “OH MY GOD I AM SO SORRY.. I DIDN’T MEAN TO.. ERRMM….I MADE THIS ALBUM FOR TODAY.. IT’S FILLED WITH CUTE PICTURES OF US..”

Deku: *already flipping the pages and crying* “I.. I lo-ve you Kacchan”

Kacchan: “Me too, nerd..”

blog.name: ride-the-bifrost
blog.title: TL;DR
blog.description: Fandoms, gaming, and everything in between! Currently taking writing prompts for various fandoms.

summary:
So I’m new to the bnha fandom, but figured I’d give my two cents on Endevor. 
Of course he’s done terrible things, and doesn’t...
body:
So I’m new to the bnha fandom, but figured I’d give my two cents on Endevor.

Of course he’s done terrible things, and doesn’t deserve forgiveness, but I don’t get all the people saying he doesn’t deserve a redemption arc. I thought that people like him getting better is the entire hope concerning how they develop. It can only be a good thing for everyone!

But also, I’d be quite satisfied if his family never gave him a second chance. The things he’s done are beyond most people’s capacity to forgive, and I’m really tired of the narrative where abuse victims are all “they really did change” or “I think I’m finally ready to forgive them”. The Todorokis should hate him, and at most Endeavor deserves to start over with a new family and do things properly.

I guess what I’m saying is that sure, he deserves redemption. Everyone deserves that! But that doesn’t erase the harm he caused and it shouldn’t stop people in and out of universe from hating him.

The Todorokis should hate him, and at most Endeavor deserves to start over with a new family and do things properly.

I guess what I’m saying is that sure, he deserves redemption. Everyone deserves that! But that doesn’t erase the harm he caused and it shouldn’t stop people in and out of universe from hating him.

summary: Can Todoroki burn the inside of his mouth?? Like??? I know he can get burned as evidenced by the incident with his mom, but the...
body: Can Todoroki burn the inside of his mouth?? Like??? I know he can get burned as evidenced by the incident with his mom, but the inside of his body is probably really weird. They also said that his body temperature is cold on one side and hot on the other, so eating must be really weird for him? Like does half his mouth chill the food while half heats it up and he’s stuck with luke warm food his whole life? And on top of that he probably doesn’t even know that people can get burned by food/hot drinks and the first time he sees someone do it he’s probably just sitting there like, “food can’t… burn you???? It’s food, you absolute dunce.” Because he’s lived his whole life only experiencing mild temperature food. Poor bastard is also probably confused by the concept of a brain freeze too…
